mapper.sql: t.P_ID, t.TENANT_ID, t.PROVINCE_ID, t.CITY_ID, t.P_NAME, t.PARAMS_TYPE_ID, t1.PARAMS_NAME,t.IS_VALIDATE, t.START_DATE, t.END_DATE, t.UPDATE_STAFF_ID, t.UPDATE_DEPART_ID, t.UPDATE_DATE, t.CREATE_STAFF_ID, t.CREATE_DATE, t.RESERVE_1, t.RESERVE_2, t.RESERVE_3, t.RESERVE_4, t.RESERVE_5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_qm_strategy t LEFT OUTER JOIN t_qm_static_params t1 ON t.PARAMS_TYPE_ID = t1.PARAMS_CODE
order by t.${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_qm_strategy (P_ID, TENANT_ID, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, P_NAME, PARAMS_TYPE_ID, IS_VALIDATE, START_DATE, END_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF_ID, UPDATE_DEPART_ID, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF_ID, CREATE_DATE, RESERVE_1, RESERVE_2, RESERVE_3, RESERVE_4, RESERVE_5) values (#{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValidate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDepartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
